images.description: The company logo featuring a green outline of a house with internal lighter green windows and a door.
images.suggested_usage: Use as the primary company logo in the header and footer.

images.description: A renovated house with a dark brown wooden upper facade and a light-colored lower facade, set against a backdrop of green trees and a cloudy sky.
images.suggested_usage: Use as a large hero image or a featured project image on the homepage or services section.

images.description: A modern renovated house with a dark grey tiled roof and light-colored walls, with dark framed windows. Two cars are parked on the street in front of the house.
images.suggested_usage: Use as a project showcase image or as part of a before-and-after section for renovation services.

images.description: A detailed layout design for 'ThermoSAN Sanační a Tepeplně Izolační Omítka' product packaging, showing dimensions and product information in green and white.
images.suggested_usage: Use on a dedicated 'Products' or 'Materials' page to showcase product offerings.

images.description: A detailed layout design for 'Thermo IN Stuková Omítka' product packaging, showing dimensions and product information in blue and white.
images.suggested_usage: Use on a dedicated 'Products' or 'Materials' page to showcase product offerings.
